ProductInfo.Features:
ZMODO KDF6-CARBZ8ZN-2T Expandable 8 Camera 600TVL Hi-Reso Outdoor Security System with 16 Channel 960H DVR & 2TB HDD
H.264 Hardware Compression, Signal System: NTSC / PAL, Video Input / Output: BNC 16/BNC 1, Video Output: HDMI, CVBS and VGA, Audio Input / Output: RCA 2/BNC 1, Recording Mode: Continuous/ Scheduled/ Motion, Support hard drive: up to 2*2TB
Supported Browsers: Internet Explorer, Safari, Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, IR Remote Control, PTZ via RS-485 Port, Plug-n-Play, Supports Remote View via smart phone & 3G mobile with each of these systems:  Android, iPhone & iPad IOS, Symbian, Windows Mobile
600 TV Lines Horizontal, 3.6mm Lens,  Signal: NTSC, Night Vision Min. Light: 0 Lux (IR On), IR Irradiation Distance: up to 80', Operation Temperature: 14°F~122°F, Weatherproof: Yes, Power: 12V DC, Mount: Wall, Video Connector: BNC, Power Connector: RCA 12V DC
Package Includes: (1) ZMD-DT-SFN6 16 Channel Security DVR, (1) 2TB Hard Drive, (8) ZMD-CCH-BBS23NM Hi-Reso Outdoor IR Security Cameras, (8) 60ft CCTV Power + Video Cables for Security Cameras, (2) 12V/1500mA Single Power Supply for Security Cameras, (2) 1-4 Splitter Cable for Security Cameras , (1) Power Supply for DVR, (1) IR Remote Control & Mouse, (1) User's Manual, (1) CD Software
ProductInfo.Name: ZMODO KDF6-CARBZ8ZN-2T Expandable 8 Camera 600TVL Hi-Reso Outdoor Security System with 16 Channel 960H DVR & 2TB HDD
